name: Greedy Gus
description:
Greedy Gus is trapped in a castle while finding his Girlfriend.

He has to spend coins to find more areas.

Please help Greedy Gus find his Girlfriend in this wacky adventure you do not want to miss.

Greedy Gus can get stuck sometimes because of his body shape. But you should be able to handle that.

For better experience, please play the downloadable version. 

Update, I found out that the ending in the web version is glitched so please play the Downloadable version.

Font is from https://www.dafont.com/medieval-scroll-of-wisdom.font

Tile set is from https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/2d-pixel-top-down-dungeon-...

All music is from https://www.free-stock-music.com/search.php?keyword=medieval

This game was made by Nature Studioz. All rights reserved.

Also, I would love for you to subscribe to my YouTube channel so that you can get updates on what I am doing.
